q: Congress. On Dec. 10, Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. Previous article Charges against Tenn. rapper Yo Gotti dropped

The British version is wildly entertaining, but also has a penchant for stirring up controversy. You never know what Simon Cowell has up his sleeve, and since he will be working both behind and in front of the camera, the country should brace itself to expect the unexpected. While we don't miss Simon Cowell on "American Idol" that much, this certainly throws a whole new twist on singing competitions in the U.S.
